properties.helptext:
All occurences of convertDates(*) found in the text will be converted to the new date format.
E.g. 'He was born convertDates(December 17, 2000^MMMM D, YYYY^DDMMYY)'' will be return in 'He was born 17122000', where the first parameter is the date, the second is the current format and the third is the new format.
Important: Note that the parameters are separated by ^.
Refer to date formats for more info.
